tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Extracts fields from VCF/BCF file and prints them in user-defined format
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section --collapse "${sec_default.collapse}" --exclude "${sec_default.exclude}" --format "${sec_default.format}" ${sec_default.print_header} --include "${sec_default.include}" ${sec_default.list_samples} --output-file "${sec_default.output_file}" #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #set values_sec_default_samples = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.samples_repeat]) --samples "${values_sec_default_samples}" --samples-file "${sec_default.samples_file}" #set values_sec_default_targets = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.targets_repeat]) --targets "${values_sec_default_targets}" --targets-file "${sec_default.targets_file}" --vcf-list "${sec_default.vcf_list}"

param.help: collapse lines with duplicate positions for <snps|indels|both|all|some|none>, see man page [none]
param.label: Collapse
param.name: collapse

param.help: exclude sites for which the expression is true (see man page for details)
param.label: Exclude
param.name: exclude

param.help: select sites for which the expression is true (see man page for details)
param.label: Include
param.name: include

param.help: print the list of samples and exit
param.label: List Samples
param.name: list_samples

param.help: restrict to comma-separated list of regions
param.label: Regions
param.name: regions

param.help: restrict to regions listed in a file
param.label: Regions File
param.name: regions_file

param.help: similar to -r but streams rather than index-jumps
param.label: Targets
param.name: targets

param.help: similar to -R but streams rather than index-jumps
param.label: Targets File
param.name: targets_file

param.help: process multiple VCFs listed in the file
param.label: Vcf List
param.name: vcf_list

tool.help: Extracts fields from VCF/BCF file and prints them in user-defined format
